ooC: is sharpclaw a pred? if he is, change the "two" to a "one" etc

--Perceptor/Hydras--

As Perceptor comes up to the base, he opens a comm to 
Hydras. "Hydras. This is Perceptor, I have two recruits, one of 
which is an ex-recruit who has come to his senses. Do I have 
permission to enter the base?"

--------------------------

In the Pred base:

The comm crackles, "...ex-recruit who has come to his senses. Do I 
have permission to enter the base?" The cuts out with a click.

Hydras removes his hand from Maxima's shoulder. Without hesitation, 
clear sign of a confident leader, "Bring them in, the inner auto-
pulse guns are active, but will not fire unless I trigger by voice 
command, since I'm sure that the other two heard that, they will 
know now to mess up."

The draco-bot taps away on the console with one of his hands as he 
talks to Perceptor.

"Doors are open, proceed Perceptor." The comm closes as Hydras 
finishes. "Come Maxima, we'll discuss this futher after we find out 
what these new bots are about..." he says, voice unreadable. Hydras 
turns and leaves a slight sulphuric scent in the air as his scaled 
red-black tail follows him out of the room.

--------------------------

"Doors are open, proceed Perceptor." Perceptor's comm closed as 
Hydras gave permission to enter. He turns to SharpClaw and 
Wolfenstein, "All right, follow me."

He walks up to the base. The side entrance slides open as if it was 
expecting him. He walks into the base.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> : : SharpClaw/Wolfenstein : :
> 
> Wolf takes in Perceptors words, but remains quiet. He would not 
grovel to Hydras.
> 
> The two follow Perceptor back towards the Pred base.
> 
> OOC: Hydras will be mad at Wolf because Wolf betrayed the 
Predacons and joined the nWo.
>
